segment.source: Accessibility for App-V 5.0
segment.target: Accessibility for App-V 5.0

segment.source: Accessibility for App-V 5.0
segment.target: Accessibility for App-V 5.0

segment.source: Accessibility for App-V 5.0
segment.target: Accessibility for App-V 5.0

segment.source: Microsoft is committed to making its products and services easier for everyone to use.
segment.target: Microsoft is committed to making its products and services easier for everyone to use.

segment.source: This section provides information about features and services that make this product and its corresponding documentation more accessible for people with disabilities.
segment.target: This section provides information about features and services that make this product and its corresponding documentation more accessible for people with disabilities.

segment.source: Access Any Command with a Few Keystrokes
segment.target: Access Any Command with a Few Keystrokes

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The information in this section only applies to the App-V 5.0 sequencer.
segment.target: The information in this section only applies to the App-V 5.0 sequencer.

segment.source: For specific information about the App-V 5.0 server, see the Keyboard Shortcuts for the App-V 5.0 Management Server section of this document.
segment.target: For specific information about the App-V 5.0 server, see the Keyboard Shortcuts for the App-V 5.0 Management Server section of this document.

segment.source: Access keys let you quickly use a command by pressing a few keys.
segment.target: Access keys let you quickly use a command by pressing a few keys.

segment.source: You can get to most commands by using two keystrokes.
segment.target: You can get to most commands by using two keystrokes.

segment.source: To use an access key:
segment.target: To use an access key:

segment.source: Press ALT.
segment.target: Press ALT.

segment.source: The keyboard shortcuts are displayed over each feature that is available in the current view.
segment.target: The keyboard shortcuts are displayed over each feature that is available in the current view.

segment.source: Press the letter shown in the keyboard shortcut over the feature that you want to use.
segment.target: Press the letter shown in the keyboard shortcut over the feature that you want to use.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: To cancel the action that you are taking and hide the keyboard shortcuts, press ALT.
segment.target: To cancel the action that you are taking and hide the keyboard shortcuts, press ALT.

segment.source: Keyboard Shortcuts for the App-V 5.0 Management Server
segment.target: Keyboard Shortcuts for the App-V 5.0 Management Server

segment.source: Keyboard Shortcuts for the App-V 5.0 Management Server:
segment.target: Keyboard Shortcuts for the App-V 5.0 Management Server:

segment.source: To do this
segment.target: To do this

segment.source: Press
segment.target: Press

segment.source: Rename App-V 5.0 connection groups or the App-V 5.0 publishing server description.
segment.target: Rename App-V 5.0 connection groups or the App-V 5.0 publishing server description.

segment.source: F2
segment.target: F2

segment.source: Transfer access and configuration information from an existing App-V 5.0 package.
segment.target: Transfer access and configuration information from an existing App-V 5.0 package.

segment.source: CTRL + Shift + A
segment.target: CTRL + Shift + A

segment.source: Transfer default configurations from an existing App-V 5.0 package.
segment.target: Transfer default configurations from an existing App-V 5.0 package.

segment.source: CTRL + Shift + C
segment.target: CTRL + Shift + C

segment.source: Refresh the current page of the App-V 5.0 client console.
segment.target: Refresh the current page of the App-V 5.0 client console.

segment.source: F5
segment.target: F5

segment.source: On the Connections Groups page of the client management console, copies as a new version.
segment.target: On the Connections Groups page of the client management console, copies as a new version.

segment.source: CTRL + Shift + C
segment.target: CTRL + Shift + C

segment.source: Documentation in Alternative Formats
segment.target: Documentation in Alternative Formats

segment.source: If you have difficulty reading or handling printed materials, you can obtain the documentation for many Microsoft products in more accessible formats.
segment.target: If you have difficulty reading or handling printed materials, you can obtain the documentation for many Microsoft products in more accessible formats.

segment.source: You can view an index of accessible product documentation on the Microsoft Accessibility website.
segment.target: You can view an index of accessible product documentation on the Microsoft Accessibility website.

segment.source: In addition, you can obtain additional Microsoft publications from Learning Ally (formerly Recording for the Blind & Dyslexic, Inc.).
segment.target: In addition, you can obtain additional Microsoft publications from Learning Ally (formerly Recording for the Blind & Dyslexic, Inc.).

segment.source: Learning Ally distributes these documents to registered, eligible members of their distribution service.
segment.target: Learning Ally distributes these documents to registered, eligible members of their distribution service.

segment.source: For information about the availability of Microsoft product documentation and books from Microsoft Press, contact:
segment.target: For information about the availability of Microsoft product documentation and books from Microsoft Press, contact:

segment.source: Learning Ally (formerly Recording for the Blind Dyslexic, Inc.)
segment.target: Learning Ally (formerly Recording for the Blind Dyslexic, Inc.)

segment.source: 20 Roszel Road
segment.target: 20 Roszel Road

segment.source: Princeton, NJ 08540
segment.target: Princeton, NJ 08540

segment.source: Telephone number from within the United States:
segment.target: Telephone number from within the United States:

segment.source: Telephone number from outside the United States and Canada:
segment.target: Telephone number from outside the United States and Canada:

segment.target: Fax:

segment.target: http://www.learningally.org/

segment.source: Web addresses can change, so you might be unable to connect to the website or sites mentioned here.
segment.target: Web addresses can change, so you might be unable to connect to the website or sites mentioned here.

segment.source: Customer Service for People with Hearing Impairments
segment.target: Customer Service for People with Hearing Impairments

segment.source: If you are deaf or hard-of-hearing, complete access to Microsoft product and customer services is available through a text telephone (TTY/TDD) service:
segment.target: If you are deaf or hard-of-hearing, complete access to Microsoft product and customer services is available through a text telephone (TTY/TDD) service:

segment.source: For customer service, contact Microsoft Sales Information Center at (800) 892-5234 between 6:30 AM and 5:30 PM Pacific Time, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays.
segment.target: For customer service, contact Microsoft Sales Information Center at (800) 892-5234 between 6:30 AM and 5:30 PM Pacific Time, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays.

segment.source: For technical assistance in the United States, contact Microsoft Product Support Services at (800) 892-5234 between 6:00 AM and 6:00 PM Pacific Time, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays.
segment.target: For technical assistance in the United States, contact Microsoft Product Support Services at (800) 892-5234 between 6:00 AM and 6:00 PM Pacific Time, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays.

segment.source: In Canada, dial (905) 568-9641 between 8:00 AM and 8:00 PM Eastern Time, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays.
segment.target: In Canada, dial (905) 568-9641 between 8:00 AM and 8:00 PM Eastern Time, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays.

segment.source: Microsoft Support Services are subject to the prices, terms, and conditions in place at the time the service is used.
segment.target: Microsoft Support Services are subject to the prices, terms, and conditions in place at the time the service is used.

segment.source: For More Information
segment.target: For More Information

segment.source: For more information about how accessible technology for computers helps to improve the lives of people with disabilities, see the Microsoft Accessibility website.
segment.target: For more information about how accessible technology for computers helps to improve the lives of people with disabilities, see the Microsoft Accessibility website.
